cz.artin.hackathon.simulator

Class CarInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.artin.hackathon.simulator.CarInfo

  • public class CarInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    Information about car state. It contains timestamp, uniques car id, position, angle (orientation) and speed (vector).

    • Constructor Summary
